caption.p: ( a) Chromatogram of clary sage EO, where 1: linalool, 2: terpineol, 3: linalyl acetate; ( b) Chromatogram of black pepper EO, where 1: α-pinene, 2: β-pinene, 3: limonene, 4: β-caryophyllene; ( c) FTIR spectra of pure clary sage EO and linalyl acetate; ( d) FTIR spectra of pure black pepper EO, α-pinene, limonene and β-caryophyllene.
